app_description: Inventory management based on delivery notes and invoices
kpi_inventory_value_tooltip: Total monetary value of your current inventory (cost price).
kpi_gross_profit_tooltip: Total potential gross profit if all current inventory is sold at its sale price.
kpi_docs_30d_tooltip: Number of documents processed in the last 30 days.
kpi_low_stock_tooltip: Number of items at or below their minimum stock level.
kpi_low_stock_percentage_desc: {{percentage}}% of total items are low on stock.
kpi_amount_remaining_to_pay_tooltip: Sum of all unpaid and pending payment invoices.
login_description: Enter your credentials to access your account.
login_toast_fail_desc: Invalid username or password. Please try again.
register_description: Sign up to start tracking your inventory.
register_toast_success_desc: Your account has been created. Welcome!
register_toast_fail_desc: Could not create account. Please check your details or try again later.
edit_invoice_description_file: Review and edit the extracted data for: {{fileName}}
edit_invoice_error_scan_results_not_foun: Scan results not found. They might have expired or been cleared.
edit_invoice_toast_error_loading_desc_no: Could not load the invoice data for editing. Scan results not found or expired.
edit_invoice_error_invalid_json: Invalid JSON structure received from storage.
edit_invoice_toast_error_loading_desc_in: Could not load the invoice data for editing. Invalid data format.
edit_invoice_error_invalid_structure_par: Invalid data structure received after parsing.
edit_invoice_toast_error_loading_desc_in: Could not load the invoice data for editing. Invalid data structure.
edit_invoice_error_no_key: No invoice data key provided in the URL.
edit_invoice_toast_no_data_desc: No invoice data key provided for editing.
edit_invoice_toast_new_supplier_added_de: {{supplierName}} has been added to your supplier list.
edit_invoice_toast_products_saved_desc: Your changes have been saved successfully.
edit_invoice_toast_save_failed_desc_fina: Could not save the product data after all checks. {{message}}
edit_invoice_toast_supplier_not_confirme: Please confirm the supplier before saving.
edit_invoice_toast_error_preparing_save_: Could not prepare data for saving: {{message}}. Please try again.
edit_invoice_toast_error_new_product_det: Could not check for new products needing details.
edit_invoice_toast_save_cancelled_desc_p: Price confirmation was cancelled. No changes were saved.
edit_invoice_toast_save_incomplete_desc_: New product detail entry was cancelled. Changes were not fully saved.
edit_invoice_toast_payment_due_date_skip: Payment due date was not set. Proceeding with save.
edit_invoice_no_products_found_desc: The scan did not detect any products, or the data was invalid. You can try adding rows manually or go back and upload again.
edit_invoice_scan_process_error_desc: The document scan encountered an issue: {{error}}. You can try adding rows manually or go back and upload again.
product_detail_toast_error_not_found_des: Could not find the specified product.
product_detail_error_load_failed: Failed to load product details. Please try again.
product_detail_toast_error_load_failed_d: An error occurred while loading product details.
product_detail_toast_invalid_sale_price_: Please enter a valid sale price for the product.
product_detail_toast_invalid_min_stock_d: Minimum stock level must be a non-negative number.
product_detail_toast_invalid_max_stock_d: Maximum stock level must be a non-negative number.
product_detail_toast_invalid_stock_level: Minimum stock cannot be greater than maximum stock.
product_detail_delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the product "{{productName}}".
settings_description_user: Manage your account and application settings.
settings_description_guest: Log in to manage your account settings.
settings_pos_integration_desc: Connect and manage your Point of Sale system integration.
settings_login_required: You need to be logged in to view your settings.
settings_accountant_page_description: Enter or update your accountant's contact information.
settings_accountant_toast_save_success_d: Your accountant's details have been updated.
settings_accountant_toast_save_error_des: Could not save accountant settings. Please try again.
settings_accountant_toast_invalid_email_: Please enter a valid email address for the accountant.
settings_accountant_toast_email_required: Please configure your accountant's email in Settings > Accountant Details first.
settings_accountant_details_desc: Manage your accountant's contact information for easy invoice exporting.
pos_description: Connect InvoTrack to your POS system to synchronize data.
pos_no_config_needed: No specific configuration needed for this system, or configuration fields not yet defined.
pos_manual_sync_desc: Manually synchronizes product data from the selected POS system.
pos_auto_sync_note: Note: Automatic daily sync requires additional setup (e.g., Cron Jobs).
pos_alert_select_system_desc: Please choose a POS system from the list above to configure the integration.
pos_alert_no_adapters_desc: No POS system adapters are currently configured in the application. Add adapters in the code to enable integration.
pos_config_hash_apikey_tooltip: Your unique API key for Hashavshevet.
pos_config_hash_apisecret_tooltip: Your API Secret, if required by Hashavshevet.
pos_config_hash_companyid_tooltip: Your specific company identifier in Hashavshevet.
pos_config_hash_endpoint_tooltip: Override the default API URL if needed.
pos_toast_error_loading_desc: Could not load POS integration settings.
pos_toast_error_system_change: Could not load settings for the selected system.
pos_toast_save_success_desc: POS integration settings for {{systemName}} saved successfully.
pos_toast_sync_complete_desc: Successfully synced and saved {{count}} products from {{systemId}}.
pos_toast_sync_error_desc_process: An error occurred during inventory synchronization: {{message}}
pos_toast_sync_error_desc_process_generi: An error occurred during inventory synchronization: {{message}}
inventory_toast_error_fetch_desc: Could not load inventory data. Please try again later.
inventory_description: Browse, search, and manage your inventory items.
inventory_no_items_found: No inventory items found matching your criteria.
inventory_delete_all_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all inventory items.
inventory_toast_no_data_export_desc: There is no inventory data to export.
inventory_toast_export_started_desc: Your inventory data is being downloaded as CSV.
inventory_toast_cleared_desc: All inventory items have been deleted.
inventory_toast_clear_error_desc: Could not delete inventory data. Please try again.
upload_toast_invalid_file_type_desc: Please select a JPEG, PNG, or PDF file.
upload_toast_storage_full_pending_desc: Could not save pending document record. LocalStorage quota exceeded. File: {{fileName}}
upload_toast_scan_results_too_large_erro: Scan results data is too large for localStorage ({{size}}MB).
upload_toast_critical_error_save_scan_ti: Critical Error: Cannot Save Scan Data
upload_toast_critical_error_save_scan_de: Could not save processed scan results or image. LocalStorage might be full or unresponsive. Please try clearing some space or reducing file size and try again. Error: {{message}}
upload_toast_scan_complete_desc: {{fileName}} scanned. Review and save on the next page.
upload_toast_error_scan_results_too_larg: Error scan results data is too large for localStorage.
upload_toast_critical_error_save_error_s: Could not save scan results after AI processing error. Please try again. Error: {{message}}
upload_toast_processing_failed_desc: Could not prepare data for editing. Please try again.
upload_toast_upload_failed_read_desc: Could not read the selected file.
upload_toast_upload_failed_unexpected_de: An unexpected error occurred: {{message}}. Please try again.
upload_toast_storage_full_desc_finalize: Could not save all data {{context}}. Local storage is full. Please try clearing browser data or contact support.
upload_description: Select a JPEG, PNG, or PDF file of your invoice or delivery note.
upload_history_description: Status of your recent document uploads.
documents_page_description: View and manage your scanned documents and paid invoices.
paid_invoices_description: View and manage your paid invoices.
paid_invoices_no_paid_invoices_found: No paid invoices found matching your criteria.
paid_invoices_no_receipt_image_available: Payment receipt not uploaded for this invoice.
invoice_details_no_image_available: No image available for this document.
reports_chart_no_value_trend_data: No value trend data for selected period.
reports_table_top_selling_desc: Top 5 products by total sales value in the selected period.
reports_table_stock_alert_desc: Products requiring attention based on defined stock levels.
reports_table_no_stock_alerts: No stock alerts at the moment.
reports_toast_error_fetch_desc: Could not load inventory or invoice data.
invoices_no_invoices_found: No documents found matching your criteria.
invoices_delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the document "{{fileName}}".
invoices_toast_error_fetch_suppliers_des: Could not load supplier list for filtering.
invoices_toast_error_fetch_invoices_desc: Could not load document data. Please try again later.
invoices_toast_deleted_desc: The document has been successfully deleted.
invoices_toast_delete_fail_desc: Could not delete the document. Please try again.
invoices_export_csv_no_data_desc: There is no document data to export.
invoices_export_csv_started_desc: Your document data is being downloaded as CSV.
suppliers_description: Manage and review your suppliers and their order history.
suppliers_delete_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the supplier "{{supplierName}}" and all associated data.
suppliers_details_desc: Contact information, spending analysis, and order history for {{supplierName}}.
suppliers_no_spending_data: No spending data available for the last 12 months.
suppliers_no_invoices_found_for_supplier: No documents found for this supplier.
suppliers_create_sheet_desc: Enter the details for the new supplier.
barcode_prompt_description: For each new product, provide a sale price. Barcode is optional. Confirm details for each item.
barcode_prompt_invalid_sale_price_desc: Please enter a valid, positive sale price for "{{productName}}".
barcode_prompt_incomplete_details_desc: Please ensure all remaining products (like "{{productName}}") have a valid sale price, or confirm each one individually.
barcode_prompt_item_skipped_desc: Product "{{productName}}" will not have its barcode/sale price updated now.
barcode_scanner_error_library_load: Barcode scanning library failed to load.
barcode_scanner_error_camera_in_use_getU: Camera is already in use or hardware error.
barcode_scanner_error_video_playback: Could not start camera video playback: {{errorName}} - {{errorMessage}}
barcode_scanner_error_permission_denied_: Camera access denied. Please grant permission in your browser/OS settings.
barcode_scanner_toast_permission_denied_: Allow camera access to scan barcodes.
barcode_scanner_error_no_suitable_camera: No suitable camera found. Ensure a camera is connected and enabled.
barcode_scanner_toast_camera_not_found_d: Could not find a suitable camera.
barcode_scanner_error_camera_in_use_hard: Camera is already in use by another application or encountered a hardware issue.
barcode_scanner_error_not_supported_brow: Camera access or barcode scanning is not supported by your browser or device. Ensure you are using HTTPS and a compatible browser.
barcode_scanner_toast_camera_error_desc: Could not access camera or start scan: {{message}}
barcode_scanner_dialog_description_posit: Position the barcode within the camera view.
supplier_confirmation_description: The supplier "{{supplierName}}" was extracted from the document but is not in your existing supplier list. How would you like to proceed?
supplier_confirmation_option_rename_new: Add as new supplier with a different name:
supplier_confirmation_error_empty_name: Please enter a name for the new supplier.
unit_price_confirmation_description: Some products have different unit prices than what's currently in your inventory. Please review and confirm.
payment_due_date_dialog_description: When is the payment for this invoice due?
guest_home_description: Efficiently manage your inventory, scan invoices, and gain valuable insights into your business operations. Sign up or log in to get started.
guest_home_get_started_desc: Create an account or log in to access all features.
guest_home_feature_scan_desc: Quickly digitize invoices and delivery notes using your device's camera.
guest_home_feature_inventory_desc: Keep track of your stock levels, costs, and sale prices with ease.
guest_home_feature_insights_desc: Generate reports and understand your business performance better.
paid_invoices_error_no_receipt_selected: Please select a receipt image to upload.
paid_invoices_upload_receipt_desc: To mark this invoice as paid, please upload an image of the payment receipt.
paid_invoices_file_types_text: PNG, JPG, GIF, WEBP, PDF up to 10MB
paid_invoices_toast_receipt_uploaded_des: Payment receipt for {{fileName}} uploaded and invoice marked as paid.
paid_invoices_invalid_receipt_type_desc: Please select a valid image (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WEBP) or PDF file for the receipt.
invoice_export_selected_last_month_desc: {{count}} invoices from the last 30 days selected.
invoice_export_dialog_desc: You are about to export {{count}} selected invoices.
invoice_export_note_placeholder: Add a note for your accountant...
invoice_export_error_no_selection_desc: Please select at least one invoice to export.
invoice_export_error_invalid_email_desc: Please enter a valid email address for the accountant.
invoice_export_error_unexpected_desc: An unexpected error occurred during the export process.
accounts_page_description: Manage your accounts and financial details.
accounts_open_invoices_desc: View invoices that are currently unpaid or pending payment.
accounts_no_open_invoices: No open invoices at the moment.
accounts_open_invoices_desc_period: View invoices that are currently unpaid or pending payment for the selected period.
accounts_no_open_invoices_period: No open invoices found for the selected period.
accounts_supplier_spending_desc_period: Total amount spent per supplier for the selected period.
accounts_no_spending_data_period: No supplier spending data found for the selected period.
accounts_current_month_expenses_desc: Total invoiced amount for the current month.
accounts_cash_flow_profitability_desc: Insights into your business's financial health and potential.
accounts_other_expenses_desc: Track and manage recurring expenses like electricity, water, and municipal taxes.
accounts_other_expenses_no_expenses_in_c: No expenses recorded in this category for the selected period.
accounts_add_category_dialog_desc: Enter the name for the new expense category.
accounts_add_expense_dialog_desc: Enter the details for the new expense.
accounts_toast_expense_invalid_amount_de: Please enter a valid, positive amount for the expense.
accounts_toast_expense_category_empty_de: Please select a category for the expense.
accounts_toast_expense_invalid_date_desc: Please select a valid date for the expense.
accounts_other_expenses_summary_desc: Click to view and manage your other business expenses like electricity, water, etc.
